Package Controller

Class ModAppointmentWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.ModAppointmentWindowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ModAppointmentWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Joshua Breen C195 Project Modify Appointment controller, is used to modify and update the appointments in the database. Message Display Lambda is used to consolidate the error messages to one location for easier updating.

        public void saveModAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

        Parameters:

      • getApptInfo

        public void getApptInfo()
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Takes the appointment info selected from the table. It pulls out the Appointment ID and populates the input boxes with the information from the database for that appointment. It then converts the timestamp into a date and time to fill the date and time input boxes. It also takes the Contact ID and Customer ID to populate those combo boxes with the selected individuals.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • modAppointment

        public boolean modAppointment()
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        It first checks to make sure all inputs boxes have a selection made or input typed in. After that it saves all the inputs and converts the time and date into a time stamp. It runs SQL to update the appointment in the database. Returns True if it is successful.
        Returns:
        true if successful
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
